publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3670.1 Margaret Mitchell: Violence Against Women—As an amendment to motion (S2M-3670) in the name of Malcolm Chisholm, insert after “Rape Crisis Specific Fund;” “recognises the expertise and contribution the voluntary sector can provide in dealing with domestic abuse; acknowledges that usually the best outcome for women and children is one where they can remain in the family home;”
